CheckTitle: Ensure log monitoring and alerts are set up for OSS permission changes
Description: It is recommended that a metric filter and alarm be established for OSS Bucket RAM changes.
Risk: Monitoring changes to OSS permissions may reduce time to detect and correct permissions on sensitive OSS bucket and objects inside the bucket.

Recommendation.Text: Logon to SLS Console. Ensure the OSS are Enabled. Select Alerts. Ensure alert rule has been enabled for OSS permission changes.

Notes: This check aligns with CIS Alibaba Cloud Foundations Benchmark
